p: The novel coronavirus COVID-19 that originated in Wuhan, China (Zhou et al. 2020; Chowdhury et al. 2020) is showing its severity in the form of new human-to-human transmission (Bhattacharya et al. 2020) and has now become a global concern (Hassan et al. 2020; Mothay and Ramesh 2020; Yaseen et al. 2020). The present COVID-19 pandemic, with its first case reported in India on 30 January 2020, has a severity in terms of attacking the respiratory system (Table 2), especially in persons aged 50 and above.
